content.text: Hey, I'm going to a pride parade with my friends this weekend!
That's awesome! I love going to pride parades too. I'm going to the one in my city this year too.
Great! What's your favorite part about pride parades?
I love dancing around with my friends and celebrating our community.
I know, right? It's so much fun to be around so many people who love and support you for who you are.
Totally! I also love seeing all the different kinds of people who come to pride. It's so diverse and inclusive.
Me too! It's so amazing to see so many different cultures and backgrounds represented.
Have you been to many pride parades?
A few, but this will be my first one in my new city. I'm really excited to see what it's like here.
I'm sure it'll be great! I love the pride parades in my city. They're always so much fun.
Me too! I can't wait to go!
